install: composer install && apt-get update && apt-get install -y nodejs mysql-server mysql-client && npm install express sqlite3 fs path module commander
start: php -S 0.0.0.0:8080 && node server.js && bash aiven.sh && bash lamp-start.sh && service mysql status && mysql_secure_installation && mysql -u root && SOURCE db.sql && chown -R www-data:www-data /app && chmod -R 755 /app && service apache2 start
